name: Fantastic 2br 2ba in Boston
description:
( Medical stuff are very welcome if they like to use our apt for quarantine to provide more safe to their families, and they have a special discount),
Live at very luxury 2br 2ba the heart of Boston and close to everything, Longwood hospitals area ( Boston’s children’s hospital, Brigham & women’s hospital, Dana-Farber & Beth Israel hospital), here you are to close to the transportation either the bus which has station at the door of the building, or the train which also few steps.
